description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a wraparound dormer to the sides and rear with 1 front roof light, erection of front porch (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because, as a matter of fact and degree, the works required to construct the proposed development would not constitute additions or alterations to the roof of the dwellinghouse because the changes would be so great as to require a substantial demolition and rebuild of the roof.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3, Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because, as a matter of fact and degree, the works required to construct the proposed development would not constitute additions or alterations to the roof of the dwellinghouse because the changes would be so great as to require a substantial demolition and rebuild of the roof.
